p: The behavior of the nano-emulsions was evaluated in term of the droplet growth (expressed as the percentage of the droplet size increase) [ 25] within a period of storage and was calculated as follows: DG = [(Sizet2 − Sizet1)/Sizet1] × 100, (1) where Sizet1 is the average size in the lower limit and Sizet2 is the average size in the upper limit of the t1 → t2 range of the DG calculation.
